definition: seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects
the Great Nebula in Orion M42
pinyin: Lie4 hu4 zuo4 da4 xing1 yun2
lie4 hu4 zuo4 liu2 xing1 yu3

sentences.english: The magnificent Orion Nebula, or M42, is a fuzzy patch in Orion's Sword.
sentences.chinese: 美丽的猎户座星云和M42就是猎人手中的那把刀。

sentences.english: Therefore Pleiadian and Orion tones of creation are poisonous unto earth.
sentences.chinese: 因此昂宿星和猎户座的造物音调对地球是有毒的。

sentences.english: Why? They came from the Pleiades or Orion.
sentences.chinese: 为什么？因为他们来自昴宿星或猎户座。

sentences.english: Actually the star just at the top is the lefthand star in Orion.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，上边那颗星就是猎户座中左侧的一颗星。

sentences.english: Before long, Orion is jarred by the release of its large heat shield.
sentences.chinese: 不久后，猎户座发出刺耳声响，放掉庞大的防热盾。

sentences.english: Additional stars in Orion are sprinkled throughout the image in a rainbow of colors.
sentences.chinese: 猎户座中的其他恒星喷射出遍及画面的彩虹般色彩。

sentences.english: Orion was named after a mighty Greek hunter .
sentences.chinese: 猎户座是以一个强大的希腊狩猎者命名的。

sentences.english: They came from the Pleiades or Orion.
sentences.chinese: 因为他们来自昴宿星或猎户座。

sentences.english: This is the annual Orionid meteor shower.
sentences.chinese: 这就是每年的猎户座流星雨。

sentences.english: Orion'sresemblance to the Apollo command module is only skin-deep.
sentences.chinese: “猎户座”类似于阿波罗指令舱的这种说法是肤浅的。

sentences.english: This iteration of Orion is intended for trips to Mars or far-off asteroids.
sentences.chinese: 猎户座的迭代是为了打算远行到火星或遥远的小行星。

definition: Vega, brightest star in constellation Lyra 天琴星座
Antares, the brightest star in Scorpio 天蠍座|天蝎座[Tian1 xie1 zuo4]
Sagittarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
